hanzi-su-wiki:
圧

Значения

Давить, нажимать; подавлять

Мнемоника

Давление падающих сверху камней на почву 土 под обрывом 厂.

Варианты

壓, 压
purpleculture_pinyin:
yā
Japanese variant of 压
Японский вариант давления
rtega_mnemonic:
壓壓RS
压压		圧press, oppress, crush, pressure
  • the weight of cliffs 厭/厂 and ground 土 crushes everything
heisig_story: One of the things that causes the erosion of soil is the excessive pressure of the topsoil on the lower soil. This can be caused by any number of things from heavy rainfall to heavy buildings to the absence of sufficient deep-rooted vegetation to hold the layers together. Here we see a steep cliff without a tree in sight. The slightest pressure on it will cause a landslide, which, with a little help from your imagination, you will be able to see happening in this character.
koohiiStory1: The GROUND at the base of a CLIFF must suffer from enormous pressure.
koohiiStory2: For physics people: p = F/A (p:pressure, F:Force, A:Area). Where the force is from the immensity of the cliff. The area on the cliff is covered by soil. So the equation becomes p = F/A = cliff/soil which preserves the position of the primitives.
kunYomi: お.す、へ.す、おさ.える、お.さえる
jp_example_words:
圧迫(あっぱく): pressure, coercion, oppression
圧力(あつりょく): stress, pressure
抑圧(よくあつ): check, restraint, oppression, suppression
圧縮(あっしゅく): compression, condensation, pressure
気圧(きあつ): atmospheric pressure
血圧(けつあつ): blood pressure
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The dirt under a cliff is going to be under a lot of pressure.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being down there with all that dirt. Imagine feeling the pressure closing in around you. It's so hard to breathe... h... help!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The dirt being crushed under this pressure can't help but react by sneezing out, "Achoo (あつ)!" This sneeze-inducing pressure probably has something to do with where earthquakes come from.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine you're the dirt being pressed from every direction, the pressure so strong, and it squeezes an ACHOO right out of you.
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 庄 (ショウ поместье).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ground (土) under the cliff (厂) is under pressure

Heisig: One of the things that causes the erosion of soil is the excessive pressure of the topsoil on the lower soil. This can be caused by any number of things from heavy rainfall to heavy buildings to the absence of sufficient deep-rooted vegetation to hold the layers together. Here we see a steep cliff without a tree in sight. The slightest pressure on it will cause a landslide, which, with a little help from your imagination, you will be able to see happening in this character.
koohii1: The GROUND at the base of a CLIFF must suffer from enormous pressure.
koohii2: For physics people: p = F/A (p:pressure, F:Force, A:Area). Where the force is from the immensity of the cliff. The area on the cliff is covered by soil. So the equation becomes p = F/A = cliff/soil which preserves the position of the primitives.

Radicals: 厂, 土  (cliff, dirt)
Meaning Mnemonic
The dirt under a cliff is going to be under a lot of pressure.
Imagine being down there with all that dirt. Imagine feeling the pressure closing in around you. It's so hard to breathe... h... help!
Reading Mnemonic
The dirt being crushed under this pressure can't help but react by sneezing out, "Achoo (あつ)!" This sneeze-inducing pressure probably has something to do with where earthquakes come from.
Imagine you're the dirt being pressed from every direction, the pressure so strong, and it squeezes an ACHOO right out of you.
